cit.q: who asks for a sieve, who asks for a trough

cit.quote: Narti ostitæj kæmæn æ usqæbæl amæntæn, kæmæn paxsa, kæmæn sagojnæ, otemæj semuncæ

cit.q: из нартовских женщин у кого на плече корыто, у кого грабли, у кого вилы — так они плясали хоровод
among Nart women someone has a trough on the shoulder, someone has a rake, someone has a pitchfork — this way they danced in a round dance
who asks for a sieve, who asks for a trough
